changeSet.author: DurgaPrasad D
changeSet.sql: Delete from SMTparameters where SysParmCode = 'MINREQDAYS_TONEXTDATE'; INSERT INTO SMTparameters (SysParmCode, SysParmDesc, SysParmType, SysParmMaint, SysParmValue, SysParmLength, SysParmDec, SysParmList, SysParmValdMod, SysParmDescription, Version, LastMntBy, LastMntOn) VALUES (N'MAXDAYS_NEXT_INSTDATE', N'Number of Days between start Date and Next Installment Date', N'int', N'0', N'60', 2, 0, NULL, NULL, N'Number of Days between start Date and Next Installment Date', 1, 1000, NULL);
